title: Daydream App does not recognize Paired Controller Pixel 3XL
content: My Daydream controller pairs with my 3XL when the Daydream app asks me to push the button, but after the "allow access to contacts & history" pops up the app loses the controller, asking me to try again, however when I look in Bluetooth settings the Daydream Controller is listed as paired.  Why can't the app see the paired controller?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
